question: 湯豆腐
sourceMnemonic: <ja>豆腐</ja> is <kanji>tofu</kanji>, and <ja>湯</ja> means <kanji>hot water</kanji>, making it tofu you've put in hot water, aka <vocabulary>boiled tofu</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of <ja>豆腐</ja> and the kun'yomi reading of <ja>湯</ja>. You should be able to read this on your own. Will of course help to know <ja>豆腐</ja> as well.
